amendment.description: To require a determination to provide assistance for the safeguarding, removal, or elimination of conventional weapons and related ammunition.

vote.text: Amendment SA 276 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 276 proposed by Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S3175; text: CR S3175) To require a determination to provide assistance for the safeguarding, removal, or elimination of conventional weapons and related ammunition.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 276 proposed by Senator Lugar.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 276 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
